Name: brown shrimp allergy
Definition: A crustacean allergy triggered by Farfantepenaeus aztecus.

Name: Indian prawn allergy
Definition: A crustacean allergy triggered by Fenneropenaeus indicus.

Name: tiger prawn allergy
Definition: A crustacean allergy triggered by Penaeus monodon.

Name: white shrimp allergy
Definition: A crustacean allergy triggered by Litopenaeus vannamei.
